name: Rain (itch) (DDRKirby(ISQ))
description:
Rain v1.07
by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia
Released under the Cocoa Moss label

Soundtrack download

Rain is an atmospheric interactive piece about a walk in the rain, developed in Summer 2014 in collaboration with Kat Jia, who provided artwork and design. Inspired by games such as Journey, our aim was to create an experience that captures a certain mood and presents a world to explore and discover with no score, time limits, or enemies.

You can learn more about the making of Rain at Kat's site.
